Jason is asking for a loan to buy spare parts for the tricycle like tires, nuts and bolts, chains and fuel. 

A loan will help Jason improve his business and his income.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the tricycle like tires, nuts and bolts, chains and fuel

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of 6 children.  She is from Talibon, Bohol. 

She has been engaged in hog raising for 3 years now. This is her source of living. 

Jocelyn would like to take a loan to buy piglets to raise and animal feed. 

A loan will help her improve the productivity of her pig raising business.  

Jocelyn dreams of expanding her business in the future in order to generate more revenue.

loans.use: to buy piglets to raise and animal feed

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita is a seaweed farmer from Talibon, Bohol. She is 45 years old, married, and has four children. 

Esterlita is asking for a loan to buy seaweed seedlings, rope and straw. 

A loan will help her improve the productivity of her seaweed farm.

loans.use: to buy seaweed seedlings, rope, and straw

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a 37-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Talibon, Bohol. 

She is engaged in seaweed farming business. Her husband also works as a fisherman. 

Evelyn is requesting a loan to buy seaweed seedlings, rope, and straw. 

A loan will help her improve her business and her income.

loans.use: to buy seaweed seedlings, rope, and straw

loans.name: Severino

texts.en:
Severino is a 63-year-old farmer from Talibon, Bohol. He is married and has 4 grown children. 

Severino has been growing rice in his farm for several years now. 

Severino is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. 

A loan will help him improve the productivity of his farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en: Marcelina is a 52-year-old, married woman from Talibon, Bohol, Philippines. She has 11 children. Marcelina earns a living through her sari-sari store (small convenience store). She has operated her store for more than five years. Marcelina would like to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil. This loan will enable Marcelina to increase her product selection, thus attracting more buyers to her store. In the future, Marcelina dreams of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.en: Francisco is a 38-year-old man from Talibon, Bohol, Philippines. He has been farming seaweed for more than two years. Francisco is requesting to take a loan to buy seaweed seedlings, rope and straw. A loan will help him improve his business as well as his income.

loans.use: to buy seaweed seedlings, rope and straw.

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita is a 58-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. Anecita makes a living operating a fishing business with her husband. This has been her source of income for more than five years. 

Anecita is asking to take a loan to buy fishing nets, lead weights, and hooks, and to pay for the repair of the fishing boat. A loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lead weights, and hooks, and to pay for the repair of the fishing boat

loans.name: Felix

texts.en:
Felix is a 43-year-old fisherman from Talibon, Bohol. He has been in the fishing business for more than 20 years. Fishing is a very lucrative business in his area. 

Felix would like to take a loan to buy new fishing nets and lead weights. Felix hopes of making his fishing venture a success through his loan.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets and lead weights

loans.name: Asteria

texts.en:
Asteria is a 43-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 3 children. 

Asteria earns a living through her sari-sari or retail store business. She has operated her store for more than 3 years now. 

Asteria would like a loan to buy more inventory to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil. 

This loan will enable Asteria to increase her inventory thus attracting more buyers to her store.

In the future, Asteria dreams of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more inventory to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 61-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. 

She makes a living through retail sales of personal and kitchen products like detergent, dish washing soap, mosquito and cockroach killer, perfume, lotions and other items.

Rosalinda is asking for a loan to buy  detergent, dish washing soap, mosquito and cockroach killer, perfume, lotions, and other items.  

A loan will allow Rosalinda to increase her inventory thus allowing her to sell more to her customers. 

Rosalinda dreams of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy detergent, dish washing soap, mosquito and cockroach killer, perfume, lotions and other items

loans.name: Jessie

texts.en:
Jessie is a 32-year-old fisherman from Talibon, Bohol. He is married and has two children. 

He has been in the fishing business for more than 20 years now. Fishing is a very lucrative business in his area. 

Jessie would like a loan to buy new fishing nets and lead weights.

Jessie hopes of making his fishing venture a success through his loan.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets and lead weights

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a 58-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 2 grown up children. 

Virginia earns a living through her sari-sari or retail store business. She has operated her store for more than 15 years now. 

Virginia would like to take a loan to buy more inventory to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil. 

This loan will enable Virginia to improve and increase her inventory thus attracting more buyers to her store. 

In the future, Virginia dreams of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more inventory to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil

loans.name: Agapito

texts.en: Agapito is a 44-year-old, married man from Getafe, Bohol, Philippines. Agapito earns a living through his sari-sari store (small convenience store). He has operated his store for more than three years. He is also a glass cutter. Agapito would like to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil. This loan will enable Agapito to increase his product selection, thus attracting more buyers to his store. In the future, Agapito dreams of making his business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in his store.

loans.name: Nancy Massiel

texts.es:
Nancy es una joven que a sus veinticuatro años de edad tiene trazada su principal meta, que es convertirse en licenciada en administración de empresas. Ella decidió estudiar esta carrera dada su pasión por el monitoreo financiero y sus destrezas en liderazgo. Impulsada por su padre que es inspector de transporte y por su madre quien es ama de casa, ha dado todo de si misma en sus años en la universidad. Ella pone en alto los valores de responsabilidad, honestidad y justicia que le fueron enseñados en su hogar. 
Esta admirable joven divide su tiempo entre el trabajo en una empresa de energía eléctrica y sus clases. Actualmente, está en un momento clave para egresar, cursa su último año de carrera universitaria, el cual es iniciar su curso de titulación. Por esta razón, Nancy ha recurrido a un préstamo de Kiva y MiCrédito, para poder pagar todos los gastos que demanda dicho curso. Ella está llena de sueños, en un futuro se ve con un negocio propio y estudiando derecho como segunda licenciatura.
texts.en:
Nancy is a young woman who at twenty four years old has her main goal mapped out, that is to become qualified in business administration. She decided to study this career given her passion for financial monitoring and her leadership skills. Inspired by her father who is a transport inspector and her mother who is a housewife, she has given her all in her years at university. She holds in high regard the values of responsibility, honesty and fairness which were taught to her at home.

This admirable young woman divides her time between working in en electric energy company and her classes. It is now a key moment for her graduation, she is in the last year of university, which is beginning her graduation course. For this reason, Nancy has turned to Kiva and MiCrédito for a loan to be able to pay the costs which this course demands. She has many dreams, in the future she sees herself with her own business, and studying law as a second degree.

loans.use: to pay for her degree course.

loans.name: Leidy Johana

texts.es:
Leidy es una mujer de 23 años de edad la cual se desempeña como madre amorosa y como agricultora, en vista de que los ingresos no son suficientes para cubrir los gastos de su hogar, comenzó con una actividad que realiza en los ratos libres que le quedan como ama de casa y es la cría y venta de cerdos de engorde, pollos y ganado con los que intenta mejorar las condición es de vida de su familia, está a cargo de algunos gastos en su hogar con su esposo por lo que no le queda mucho capital para invertir en su negocio. 

Es por esta razón que requiere un crédito para la compra de terneros de levante con los que podrá mejorar sus ventas e impulsar esta actividad, teniendo más activas en su micro negocio y haciendo más atractivo a la vista de los clientes pues tendrá más animales para ofertar.

Su principal sueño es poder generar buenos ingresos para no ver pasar a su familia ninguna necesidad pues es algo que vivió y que lo afecto de gran manera por esta razón trabaja incansablemente por sus hijos y su esposo.

Apoya a una campesina del campo Colombiano con grandes sueños para su familia!
texts.en:
Leidy is a 23 year old woman who works as a loving mother and farmer. Because their household earnings were not enough to cover the expenses of her home, she began an activity that she does in her leftover free time as a housewife. Leidy raises and sells pigs for fattening, chickens and cattle with which she intends to improve the living conditions of her family. She is in charge of some of the expenses of her home with her husband which means there is not much capital left to invest in her business. It is because of this situation that she needs a loan to purchase calves to raise that she will use to improve her sales and boost this activity. She will have more activity in her micro business and that will make it more attractive from the point of view of the customers because she will have more animals to offer. 

Her primary dream is to be able to generate good earnings so that she will not have to watch her family go without any necessities because this is what she lives through and it impacts her in a big way. Because of this she works tirelessly for her children and her husband. 

Support a rural Colombian farmer with her big dreams for her family!

loans.use: to purchase calves to raise that she will use to improve her sales.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a 55-year-old married woman and a mother of four grown up children from Talibon, Bohol. 

Erlinda sells various products like lotions, detergent, shampoo, toiletries and other items.

She wants a loan to buy detergent, shampoo, lotions, toiletries, and other items.  

A loan will help her improve her inventory thus attracting more customers.

Erlidna hopes of making her business a success in the future.

loans.use: to buy detergent, shampoo, lotions, toiletries, and other items

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is a 42-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 2 children. 

Julieta earns a living through her sari-sari or retail store business. She has operated her store for more than 2 years now. 

Julieta would like  a loan to buy more inventory to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil. 

This loan will enable Julieta to improve her inventory thus attracting more customers to her store. 

In the future, Julieta dreams of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more inventory to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil

loans.name: Bebiana

texts.en:
Bebiana is a 49-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Talibon, Bohol. Bebiana works with her husband on their fishing business. This business has supplied them the income that they need for the past five years. 

Bebiana is asking to avail a loan to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other materials needed for the business. A loan will help them improve their catch, which will allow them to sell more fish to the market for a good price.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other tools

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
Aileen is a 29-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Talibon, Bohol. Aileen works with her husband on their fishing business. This business has supplied them the income that they need for the past two years. 

Aileen is asking to avail a loan to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other materials needed for the business. A loan will help them improve their business as well as their income.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other tools

loans.name: Mirasol

texts.en:
Mirasol is a 32-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Getafe, Bohol. 

She has been earning a living through a rice retail business for more than 4 years now. This is the source of her income. 

Mirasol is asking for a loan to buy more rice to sell. This loan will enable her to increase her rice inventory thus allowing her to sell more to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell

loans.name: France Joseph

texts.en:
France Joseph is a motorcycle driver from Talibon, Bohol. He is married and has three children. 

France Joseph is asking to take a loan to buy spare parts for his motorcycle like tires, nuts and bolts, fuel and other parts. A loan will help him improve his business as well as his income.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motorcycle like tires, nuts and bolts, fuel and other parts

loans.name: Felisa

texts.en:
Felisa is a 58-year-old sari-sari store owner from Getafe, Bohol.  She is married and has four children. 

She has operated her store for several years now. 

Felisa wants to avail a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil. 

This loan will help Felisa improve her inventory thus attracting more buyers to her store. 

In the future, Felisa dreams of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil

loans.name: Janice

texts.en:
Janice is a 29-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Talibon, Bohol. 

She is a farmer and has been in the farming business for more than 8 years now. This is the source of her income. 

Janice is asking to take a loan to buy more fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. 

This loan will enable her to improve the productivity of her farm, her harvest, and income.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizer and pesticides for the farm

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is a 56-year-old married woman and a mother of seven grown up children from Getafe, Bohol.  

She is engaged in the tuba or coconut wine business with her husband. Some of the wines are fermented into vinegar.  This is the source of her income. 

Conchita is asking for a loan to buy more containers for the tuba. 

A loan will help her improve her business and her income.

loans.use: to buy more containers for the tuba

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
Pacita is 55 years old and a farmer from Talibon, Bohol. She is married. 

Pacita has grown rice in her farm for than 30 years now.  She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides.  A loan will help her improve her farm’s productivity.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farm

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en:
This young and nice lady lives in Stepanavan city of the Lori region. She is 28 years old and already mother of two cheerful boys. 

Lusine has a higher education in teaching.  She is a beginner in this field, with only two years of work experience, but she is already a beloved teacher in the school where she works. She teaches physics to the higher classes. She is a very patient and clever teacher, and she has a group of pupils who come to her house, where she gives private lessons in physics. In this way she helps them to overcome hardships that some of them have during the lessons at  school. 

She says she enjoys her work both at the school and at her house, but she is sure that if she had a computer, she could make her lessons at her house more interesting, informative, and didactic.

She asks this loan of AMD 300.000 to spend on the purchase of computer, which she will use as a new source of information for her courses at her house with pupils.

loans.use: to buy a computer, which she will use in her private physics lessons at her house.

loans.name: Ashkhen

texts.en:
Ashken happily lives in the frontier village Aygehovit of Tavush region. As she says she enjoys her farming and agricultural activities and the fact of living in the frontier village makes her to work harder to develop her farm. 

She says she wants to be an example for all the young families to stay in their village, in order to prosper their native village by keeping it densely populated and managing to have good living conditions in every family. For her family she has chosen farming and agriculture as a source of earning a living. 

In her farm she has cows, pigs, and chickens and thanks to them she has profits from selling milk, meat, and eggs.  

Her plot of land also is rich with harvests (apples, figs, persimmons, grapes, mulberries, and dewberries) that both feed her big family and allows her to sell it at the wholesale market. 

Ashken, and her husband, works all day long and little by little their 4 children are also becoming active in farming and agriculture; each of them has a very important function especially during harvesting time or animal feeding. 

This will be Ashkhen's second Kiva loan and again she has plans of enlarging her farm and hopes that Kiva lenders will again appreciate her ideas and finance her to realize it.   With this loan amount she will buy several pigs to develop swine breeding in order to start to sell pork, and also buy animal fodder for all her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy several pigs to develop swine breeding, in order to start to sell pork, and to buy animal fodder for all her farm cattle

loans.name: May Lourdes

texts.en:
May Lourdes is a 29 year old merchant from Talibon, Bohol. She is married and has three children. May Lourdes sells ready to wear clothes or bargain clothes to the people in her area. She has been in the business for more than 5 years now.

May Lourdes is requesting a loan to buy more stock of items like bargain clothes and shoes to sell to her customers. In the future, May Lourdes dreams of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more stock of items like bargain clothes and shoes to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Christiana Isabel

texts.es:
Christiana es una mujer esforzada, de treinta y seis años de edad, tiene dos hijos, vela por el cuidado de su madre que está enferma a causa de un derrame cerebral desde hace un año. Ella trabaja como ejecutiva de cuentas y estudia mercadotecnia en la universidad los domingos. A pesar de todas sus responsabilidades, ella está decidida en ser una profesional de éxito. Apoyada por su esposo ha conseguido llegar a su último año de la licenciatura. 
Para poder egresar de la carrera, Christiana debe pagar un curso de titulación y luego hacer gestiones para que le otorguen su título, por estos motivos ella solicita un préstamo a Kiva y MiCrédito y así cancelar los pagos necesarios para coronar su carrera. Espera graduarse con honores, obtener un mejor trabajo y en un futuro invertir en un negocio propio.
texts.en:
At thirty-six, Christiana has a lot on her plate: a mother of two, she also takes care of her mother, who suffered a brain haemorrhage one year ago. She is an accountant and goes to university on Sundays to study marketing. Her responsibilities will not prevent her from becoming a successful professional. Thanks to her husband's support, she is now about to graduate after four years of studying.
In order to become a certified professional, she needs to attend a special course and follow an administrative procedure. Christina asks Kiva for a loan through MiCrédito in order to pay university fees for her last year. She hopes to graduate with honours, find a better job, and, in the future, have a business of her own.

loans.use: to pay for university and graduation fees.

loans.name: Claudia Vanessa

texts.es:
Claudia es una mujer luchadora, que con solo veintiséis años de edad, ha logrado distribuir su tiempo en ser, estudiante universitaria, madre de un niño de un año de edad y trabajadora en una empresa de análisis comercial. Con una sonrisa en su rostro avanza poco a poco sus objetivos, teniendo como principal inspiración a su hijo y padres quienes le apoyan en todas sus decisiones. 
Esta responsable joven, estudia marketing y publicidad. Actualmente está en su último año de la carrera. En el cual le corresponde iniciar su curso de titulación para convertirse en una profesional certificada y poder optar a un mejor trabajo, con un mejor salario. Por este motivo Claudia solicita un préstamo a Kiva junto MiCrédito, con este poder hacer los pagos para llevar a cabo su curso. En un futuro ella desea llenar de orgullo a sus padres, proporcionarle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo y ser una mujer que contribuya al desarrollo de la sociedad.
texts.en:
Claudia is full of fighting spirit. At the tender age of 26, she manages to attend university, care for a one-year-old and work at a business analysis company. With a smile on her face, she achieves her goals one by one. Her main sources of inspiration are her son and her parents, who support her in all her decisions.
She is a responsible young woman who studies marketing and advertisement. This is her last year of university, during which she will have to take a special course designed to make her a certified professional. She will thus be able to choose a better job and enjoy a better income. Claudia asks Kiva for a loan through MiCrédito in order to pay university fees for her last year. Her goals for the future are to make her parents proud, to give her son a better life and to contribute to the advancement of society.

loans.use: to pay for university and graduation fees.

loans.name: Jaime Luis

texts.es:
Jaime es un hombre de 35 años de edad la cual se desempeña como padre amoroso y como agricultor, día a día intenta mejorar las condiciones de su familia.
Es por esta razón que requiere un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, pesticidas, riegos, entre otros para aplicarlos a sus tierras.

Su principal sueño es poder generar buenos ingresos para no ver pasar a su familia ninguna necesidad pues es algo que vivió y que lo afecto de gran manera por esta razón trabaja incansablemente por sus hijos y su esposa.

Apoya a un campesino del campo Colombiano con grandes sueños para su familia!
texts.en:
Jaime is a 35 year old man who works as a loving father and farmer. Day after day he seeks to improve the conditions of his family. It is because of this reason that he needs a loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides and irrigation supplies, among others, to apply to his land. His primary dream is to be able to generate good earnings so that he will not have to see his family go without any necessity, which is something he has lived with and has impacted him greatly. It is because of this reason that he works tirelessly for his children and his wife. 

Support a rural Colombian farmer with his big dreams for his family!

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides and irrigation supplies, among others, to apply to his land.

loans.name: Ruddy Enmanuel

texts.es:
Con una voz que transmite tranquilidad, cuida Ruddy, un joven de veinticuatro años de edad, a los pacientes que llegan a la unidad de emergencias del hospital donde está haciendo sus prácticas pre profesionales. El decidió estudiar enfermería por su gran sentimiento de ayudar a los enfermos, apoyado por su madre la cual es ama de casa y su padre quien es carpintero, ha logrado sacar su carrera adelante, que ahora ya está por finalizar. 
Luego de mantenerse firme durante los cinco años que lleva estudiando la carrera, se siente muy emocionado porque está a un paso de graduarse en su licenciatura en enfermería. Es por eso que el deposita todas sus esperanzas en Kiva y MiCrédito para que le otorguen un préstamo que le permita pagar los tramites de titulación y así egresar he insertarse al mundo laboral para salir adelante junto con su familia.
texts.en:
With a voice that transmits calmness, Ruddy, a young man of twenty four years of age, cares for the patients that arrive at the emergency department of the hospital where he is doing his pre professional practice. He decided to study nursing out of his strong desire to help the sick. Supported by his mother who is a housewife and his father who is a carpenter, he has managed to move forward in his career and is now on the point of finishing. 

Having remanined steadfast during the five years that he has been studying for his degree, he feels very emotional because he is one step away from graduating from his nursing degree. For this reason he is putting all his hopes in Kiva and MiCrédito granting him a loan that will allow him to pay the graduation fees, so he can graduate and enter the world of work and move forward together with his family.

loans.use: to pay for his university qualification.

loans.name: Gloria Isabel

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer dedicada a su familia y a su labor. Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido salir adelante, sobrepasando diversos obstáculos que se le han presentado. 
Desde hace 2 años inició su propio negocio, un salón de belleza que ubicó en un espacio de la casa donde reside, además, también presta el servicio a domicilio, según el requerimiento de sus clientes. 
Trabaja todos los días durante 4 horas con sola.
Esto le ha permitido generar los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y a solventar las necesidades de su único hijo. 

El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de insumos al por mayor (tratamientos capilares, shampoo, acondicionador, esmaltes para uñas, entre otros), esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y prestar un servicio más completo a sus clientes, de una manera más ágil y eficiente; lo que beneficiará el margen de utilidades que percibe por su labor. 

Gloria manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder continuar con su labor, acreditar y fortalecer bien su negocio para lograr ser más competitiva en el mercado y así tener la capacidad para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Gloria is dedicated to her family and to her work. She was able to improve her lot in life thanks to her tenacity and perseverance, which helped her overcome various obstacles that stood in her way.
Two years ago, she started her own business, a beauty salon located in a room at her house. She also goes to clients' houses if they so wish.
She works alone every day for four hours.
Thanks to her business, she earns enough to help her husband with household expenses and to make sure her only child wants for nothing. 
She asks for a loan to buy supplies wholesale (hair treatment, shampoo, conditioner, nail polish, etc.). This will enable her to stay in business and improve the range of services she provides, in a quicker and more efficient way. She will thus increase her profits. 
Gloria says that her greatest wish is to keep her business, to provide it with funds and to develop it. She aims to be more competitive on the market in order to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy supplies wholesale for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Deisy Julieth

texts.es:
Deisy, una mujer de 23 años de edad que ha dado toda su vida en beneficio de su familia intentando sacarla  adelante y superando juntos las adversidades que se les han presentado en la vida; gracias a una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo, paciencia y sacrificio logro montar, ha generado los ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. 
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 10 horas.
Buscando ser la mejor empresa familiar del sector quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido que le permitan aumentar su inventario como granos y abarrotes.
De esta forma ira superando dificultades como las bajas ventas y la competencia.

Este crédito será la gran oportunidad para consolidarse como la tienda más productiva en el barrio y le dará la oportunidad de cumplir ese sueño que tanto ha anhelado de comprar una vivienda propia.

Apoya a Deisy con su negocio!
texts.en:
Deisy, 23, has dedicated her life to improving her family's. Together, they overcome all kinds of adversity. She has a shop of her own and it took her a lot of patience, effort, and sacrifice to set it up. The income she derives from it goes towards providing for her children.
She works alone every day for ten hours.
Her goal is to be the best family-owned business in her area, so she asks for a loan to buy various types of merchandise in order to sell a greater range of items, such as grains and groceries.
She counts on this opportunity to help her overcome challenges posed by low sales and competition.
This is her chance to consolidate her position as the most productive shop in the neighbourhood and one day make her dream of buying a house of her own come true.
Support Deisy and her shop!

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Adriana Cristina

texts.es:
Adriana de 39 años de edad, se ha ganado el cariño de todos sus vecinos por su amabilidad y buen sentido del humor. 

Ama su familia, la cual es el motor principal para luchar cada día y generar el sustento para sobrevivir. 

Aunque no contaba con recursos para iniciar su negocio, esto no fue impedimento para cumplir su sueño de convertirse en comerciante, con un pequeño capital, esta mujer inició con un negocio de tienda de abarrotes.

Sus sueños no paran, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de estanterías para ubicar sus productos y hacerlos más visibles y atractivos a sus clientes, además comprara surtido de productos de la canasta familiar para abastecer su negocio. 

Espera poder mejorar su condición económica, poder tener una vejez sin preocupaciones monetarias y garantizarle a su familia un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Adriana, age 39, has won the affection of all of her neighbors because of her friendliness and her good sense of humor.  She loves her family, and they are her main drive to struggle every day and generate sustenance in order to survive.

Even though she did not have resources to start her business, this was not an impediment to fulfilling her dream of becoming a merchant.  With a little capital this woman started her grocery store business.  

Her dreams do not stop.  That is why she is requesting a loan to buy shelves for her products to make them more visible and attractive to her customers.  She will also buy stock of basic needs products to stock her business.

She hopes to be able to improve her financial situation, to be able to experience old age without money worries, and to guarantee her family a better future.

loans.use: to buy shelves and stock of groceries.

loans.name: Fidela

texts.es:
Fidela, a sus 63 años de edad, es una mujer carismática y servicial que se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes que inició por la necesidad de generar ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia. 

A pesar de las adversidades, ella tuvo la fortaleza y la determinación para levantarse y seguir adelante y, gracias a ello lleva 2 años de trayectoria en esta actividad.

Trabaja todos los días durante 8 horas sola

Su propósito en la vida es seguir progresando y por ello desea fortalecer su negocio acreditándolo con la compra de surtido de productos como abarrotes, granos, frituras, bebidas gaseosas y en general productos básicos de la canasta familiar, de esta forma podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor calidad y servicio, logrando aumentar notablemente sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe de sus ventas.

Fidela manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo su negocio con la ayuda de Interactuar y en un futuro desea convertirlo en un supermercado, en el que los clientes puedan encontrar todos los artículos que necesiten. 

Apoyando a este crédito estarás contribuyendo con el emprendimiento de las mujeres Colombianas!
texts.en:
Fidela is 63 years old and is a charismatic and friendly woman . She has her own business - a grocery store that she started out of necessity to generate income for her family. Despite adversity she had the strength and determination to pick herself up and move forward, and thanks to that she has been in business for two years.

She works every day for eight hours, alone. Her goal in life is to continue to progress and for that reason she wants to strengthen her business by buying an assortment of products such as groceries, grains, chips, soft drinks, and basic food items in general. This will allow her to offer her customers better quality and service and to significantly increase her sales and the income she receives from her sales.

Fidela states that her greatest desire is to continue to grow her business with the help of Interactuar and to one day convert it to a supermarket where her customers can find everything they need. By supporting this loan you will be contributing to the entrepreneurship of Colombian women!

loans.use: to buy a variety of products such as groceries, grains, chips, soft drinks and basic food items in general.

loans.name: Mur

texts.es:
En la minería encuentran muchas personas una oportunidad para progresar y salir delante de una manera humilde y con mucho coraje, tal es el caso de Mur que a sus 30 años es un hombre con gran talento y pasión por este oficio.
Trabaja todos los días durante pesadas jornadas de trabajo de 5 horas.

Solicita un apoyo económico para realizar mantenimiento y reparación de su canoa y su motor el cual le permitirá continuar con su oficio con el cual ha intentado obtener algunos ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia.

Una de las grandes dificultades que ha tenido que enfrentar es la falta de oportunidades para crecer y desarrollarse, pero poco a poco intentara tener una vida mejor.

Apoya a Mur con su trabajo y haz que su vida sea mejor con un préstamo.
texts.en:
Mining is an industry many people turn to in order to find an opportunity to improve their lot in life. These people need a lot of courage and reap humble rewards. Mur is one of them; at thirty years of age, he has shown talent and passion for this trade.
He works every day doing very hard labour for five hours.
He asks for financial support in order to perform repairs and maintenance on his canoe and its engine, which will enable him to keep going to work in the mine, his only source of income.
One of the greatest challenges he faces is the lack of opportunities to grow and develop, but he gradually tries to get a better life.
Help Mur stay in work and improve his life with this loan.

loans.use: to perform repairs and maintenance on his canoe and its engine.

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es:
El Sr. Feliciano es de la ciudad de San Pedro, tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa semi-nueva y un consultorio odontológico, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que está luchando para poder salir adelante y ayudar a su familia.
El pide este préstamo para la compra de prendas para la venta, y de esta forma poder seguir con sus ventas, de manera a poder seguir trabajando y luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Feliciano is from the city of San Pedro.  He has a business selling semi-new clothes and a dental office.  He is a very hard-working and enterprising person who is struggling to be able to get ahead and help his family.

He is requesting this loan to buy clothes to sell.  This way he will be able to continue with his sales.  He will be able to continue working and struggling for better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Vilinda

texts.en:
Vilinda is a 40 year merchant from Dulag, Leyte. She earns a living through retail sales of plastic and kitchen wares. Vilinda has been in the business for more than 10 years now. This is the source of her income.

Vilinda is asking to take a loan to buy more materials to sell like plates, bowls, spoons and forks, basins, chopping boards, and other kitchen materials. Vilinda believes that a loan will help her in improving her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more materials to sell like plates, bowls, spoons and forks, basins, chopping boards, and other kitchen items.

loans.name: Lexia Vittina

texts.en:
Lexia Vittina is a merchant from Talibon, Bohol. She sells various goods like Tupperware, detergents, soap and toiletries, lotions and cosmetics among other items. 

Lexia Vittina has been in this business for more than a year now. 

She is now requesting a loan to buy more products to sell like lotions, soap and toiletries, cosmetics, Tupperware and other items. 

This will enable her to attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as lotions, soap and toiletries, cosmetics, and Tupperware

loans.name: Aurita

texts.en:
Aurita is a married woman from Talibon, Bohol.  She earns a living through her catering service business. She has been in the business for more than 10 years now.

In the photo, Aurita is standing next to her catering materials. She is asking to take a loan to buy more materials for catering, like plates, spoons, forks, bowls, glasses, and others.

This purchase will enable her to improve her stock of catering materials, thus allowing her to offer more catering services to the people in her place.

loans.use: to buy more materials for catering, like plates, spoons, forks, bowls, glasses, and others

loans.name: Maristhel

texts.en:
Maristhel is a 30-year-old sari-sari store owner from Getafe, Bohol. She is married and has two children. She has operated her store for three years now.

Maristhel wants to avail herself of a loan to buy more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil.

This loan will help Maristhel in improving her stock of goods to sell, thus attracting more buyers into her store. She dreams of making her business more sustainable and productive in the future.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is a 44 year old married woman and a mother of three children from Talibon, Bohol. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business.

Merlyn is asking to take a loan to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, condiments, cooking oil, bread, biscuits, candies, soap and toiletries among other items.

This loan will help her improve her stocks thus attracting more buyers in her store.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, condiments, cooking oil, bread, biscuits, candies, soap and toiletries among other items.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.en:
Lucila is a married woman and a mother of three children from Talibon, Bohol.

Lucila is engaged in the poultry business. This has been her source of income for more than 2 years now. Lucila is asking to take a loan to buy more chickens to raise and animal feed.

A loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more chickens to raise and animal feed.

loans.name: Belmer

texts.en:
Belmer is a sari sari store owner from Dulag, Leyte. He is 30 years old and has been in the business for more than a year now. This is his source of income. 

Belmer is asking to take out a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, rice, noodles, bread, biscuits, condiments and other items. This loan will help him to improve his inventory and thus attract more buyers to his store.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, rice, noodles, bread, biscuits, condiments and other items

loans.name: Ginalyn

texts.en:
Ginalyn is a 40-year-old woman from Dulag, Leyte. She is engaged in hair rebonding and beauty services. She has been in this business for more than 10 years now. 

Ginalyn is asking to take out a loan to buy materials like hair dyes, shampoo, combs, a hair dryer, a hair blower and other items. With this, she will be able to cater to more customers and thus augment her income.

loans.use: to buy materials like hair dyes, shampoo, combs, a hair dryer, a hair blower and other items

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo is a 46-year-old, married man from Leyte, Philippines. He has 2 children. 

Romeo earns a living through his sari-sari or retail store business, and he has been running his store for more than 11 years now. 

Romeo would like to take out a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil. This loan will enable him to improve his stock and thus attract more buyers to his store. 

In the future, Romeo dreams of making his business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, condiments and cooking oil

loans.name: Renato

texts.en:
Renato is grateful that he was granted a PHP 30,000 loan, which he used to purchase various grocery items and products needed in his general store. Through his earnings, he is able to send his children to school and meet their daily living expenses.

He would now like to apply for a PHP 20,000 loan, which he will use to buy more quantities of candies, cigarettes, newspapers, and other grocery items, which he sells at retail. He is positive that more items will yield more sales and, thus, increase his earnings. His business earnings are a stable source to sustain his family's basic needs and educate his children. He is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given him. 

Renato dreams of having a bigger general store and aims to give his children the best education possible, in order for them to have a better future. Every week, he meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which he studies.

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for more products to sell in his general store.

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen says he found a good partner to develop his swine breeding and has decided to continue with the project for the second term. 

Karen lives at the frontier village Achajur which is in the Tavush region. Karen has two children and his parents live with him and help him with the farming and agriculture, since they have many years of experience in this field. 

Karen is specializing in swine breeding. In his farm he has pigs and chickens and he already has regular customers for his farm pork and eggs. 

Karen mentions that there is great demand for pork from the city butchers and the development of swine breeding again seems to be very prosperous. 

Karen still has his taxi driving occupation when he has free time from farming. In addition, land cultivation contributes greatly to his family’s income with the sale of apples, plums, and peaches from his orchard. 

Karen is very interested in swine breeding and will use his loan to buy pigs and animal fodder. 

Karen will be happy for the support from Kiva for the second time, and thanks all the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy pigs and animal fodder

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar lives in the village of Geghamavan which is in the Gegharkunik region. 

Gohar has already once benefitted from her Kiva partnership and loan with which she bought calves and fodder. She wants to continue her partnership with Kiva for a second loan.  

Gohar’s husband is a policeman and works in the Sevan police agency. Gohar is an accountant, but she prefers farming and spends all her time developing and enlarging her farm. She breeds farm cows, sheep, and pigs and her land gives her harvest of potatoes which she sells wholesale at the city market. 

Gohar is requesting a loan for the purchase of one more calf, and also to buy animal fodder for all her farm cattle. 

She will be pleased for your support for the second time.

loans.use: to buy one more calf and animal fodder for all her farm cattle

loans.name: Olga Lucia

texts.es:
Olga se dedica a la actividad de la confección desde hace aproximadamente 15 años, gracias a esto ha podido contribuir, junto con su esposo al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. 

Olga es madre de 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo necesario, debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para poder sostener su hogar, Olga decidió montar un taller donde ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros.  

Gracias a la buena calidad de las prendas que fabrica, ha podido captar una muy buena clientela, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. 

Trabaja todos los días durante 8 horas sola.

Olga actualmente quiere aumentar la capacidad de producción de su taller con el ánimo de poder pagar los estudios universitarios de sus hijos, es por esto que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos como tela, hilos y agujas.

Olga espera que de esta manera pueda cumplir su sueño de que sus hijos accedan a una educación universitaria, además, de poder mejorarle la calidad de vida a su familia. 

Olga espera que su taller aumente las ventas considerablemente y en un futuro hacerlo crecer y poder generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas. 

Ayuda con un préstamo el taller de Olga!
texts.en:
Olga has made a living manufacturing clothing for approximately 15 years. Thanks to this she has been able to contribute along with her husband to sustain the household expenses.

Olga is the mother of two children who she always wants to give everything necessary. Because the income that her husband generates is not sufficient to be able to sustain their home, Olga decided to set up a workshop where she offers a service manufacturing clothing for third parties.

Thanks to the high quality of the garments manufactured, she has been able to capture a good clientele, which has allowed her to have very good sales. She works every day for 8 hours alone. Olga currently wants to increase the production capacity of her workshop with the goal of being able to afford college for her children. This is why she hopes that a loan will give her the opportunity to access the purchase of supplies such as fabric, thread, and needles.

Olga hopes to fulfill her dream that her children access a university education, and further to be able to improve the quality of life for her family. Olga hopes that her workshop increase sales considerably in the future to make it grow and be able to generate employment for those most in need. 

Help Olga with a loan for her workshop!

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fabric, thread, and needles.

loans.name: Levis De Jesus

texts.es:
Levis, en su incansable búsqueda de una mejor vida y una mejor estabilidad económica para sus 3 hijos, inicio con un negocio de barbería prestando su servicio en su casas o a domicilio en el municipio de Sincelejo, un municipio donde el empuje y verraquera es un referente muy importante de los habitantes de esta zona.

El trabaja todos los días en horarios muy variados y siempre está ocupado en algún servicio ya que es muy solicitado por su buen trabajo.

Solicita un aliento económico para realizar la compra de cuchillas, gel, e instrumentos de trabajo que le hacen falta.

Hoy en día se siente feliz por el buen trabajo que hasta ahora ha realizado y que le ha permitido gozar de un trabajo más estable.

Con un crédito podrás apoyar a Levis a continuar con su proyecto de vida!¡
texts.en: Levis in his unceasing search for a better life and more economic stability for his 3 children, started a barber business offering service in homes or at his house in the municipality of Sincelejo. This is a municipality where drive and guts are very important to the inhabitants of the area. He works every day with different hours and he is always occupied with some work as he is much in demand due to his good work. He is requesting economic help to purchase knives, gel and other work instruments that he lacks. Today he feels quite happy with the work that he has done up to now that allows him to enjoy more stable employment. With a loan Levis can continue on with his life project.

loans.use: to buy knives. gel and work tools he lacks.

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar lives with her beloved husband and two sons in the village Tsovagyugh of Gegharkunik region. 

Gohar has been a farmer since she was a girl and she used to help her parents around their farm. Now she is already a skilled farmer in a farm she established with her husband several years ago. 

Gohar sells a lot of meat to the butchers from the city since in her farm she has cows, claves, bulls, pigs, and sheep, and the assortment of meat is in great demand. Gohar also sells milk and macun (national dairy-products) right from her house. 

She says that her family relies on her farming income, since both she and her husband are unemployed and without farming there is no income.  Their income covers their living needs, their children's education costs, and farm cattle care. 

Gohar is asking for a loan of 700.000 Armenian drams to buy one more cow and animal fodder for all her farm cattle, since the fresh grass is still too short for her cattle to be fed enough.

loans.use: to buy one more cow and animal fodder for  her farm cattle

loans.name: Lia Rocio

texts.es:
Lia es una bella mujer de 37 años de edad, madre de dos hijos, criada con unas muy buenas costumbres, desde el colegio desarrollo una gran pasión y gusto por todo lo relacionado con la belleza.  

Inicio su etapa productiva realizando cursos y capacitaciones, hasta que un día se aventuró y decidió ir en busca de su propia clientela montando un negocio de salón de belleza en su hogar. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido pues también quiere vender productos para complementar sus servicios, como crema de manos, gel, productos capilares, tinturas para cabello, barnices, también realizará algunas mejoras locativas.

El crédito para ella será muy importante pues terminara de consolidar su empresa completándola con todos los insumos necesarios para operar y ofrecer cualquier servicio que lleguen a solicitarle.

Su sueño es que su empresa progrese de la mano de Interactuar y tenga muchos clientes.
texts.en:
Lia is a beautiful woman of 37 years of age, mother of two children, and brought up with very good values. Since college she developed a great passion and enthusiasm for everything relating to beauty.

She began her working life taking courses and training programmes, until one day she decided to take the risk and go in search of her own customers, setting up a beauty salon business in her own home.

She is asking for a loan to buy a selection of products, as she also wishes to sell products that complement her services, such as hand cream, gel, hair products, hair dyes, nail varnishes, and also make some improvements to her salon.

The loan will be very important to her as it will finish establishing her business, completing it with all the stock necessary to operate and offer whatever service she is asked for.

Her dream is that her business progresses hand in hand with Interactuar, and that she has many customers.

loans.use: to buy hand cream, gel, hair products, hair dyes, nail varnishes, and also make some improvements to her salon.

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es:
Nicolas, con 53 años de edad, es casado y padre de 5 hijos. Se caracteriza por ser un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, un visionario y buen negociante. 

Siempre ha trabajado como comerciante, vendiendo extintores en el municipio de Medellin y, desde hace 3 años tiene su propio negocio.  
Ha sabido superar tiempos difíciles en el comercio y sueña con comprarse su casa propia y tener un negocio que perdure en el tiempo; es por ello que Nicolas acudió a solicitar un préstamo, el cual utilizará para comprar surtido e inventario de extintores. 
Nicolas es un hombre muy organizado aunque ha tenido que enfrentar la competencia comercial del sector.  
La suma de todos sus esfuerzos le brindan a toda su familia una calidad de vida excelente.
texts.en:
Nicolas, 53 years old, is married and the father of 5 children. He is known for being a very responsible and hardworking man, a visionary and a good businessman.

He has always worked as a businessman, selling extinguishers in the city of Medellin and, for the last 3 years he has had his own business. 

He has known how to overcome difficult times in the business and he dreams of purchasing his own house and having a business that survives in that time; it is for this reason that Nicolas resorted to requesting a loan, which he will use to purchase stock and inventory of extinguishers.

Nicolas is a very organized man even though he has had to confront commercial competition in the area. 

The sum of all his efforts provides his whole family with an excellent quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock and inventory of extinguishers

loans.name: Adela

texts.en:
Adela is a rice retailer from Dulag, Leyte. She is 61 years old, married and has three grown up children. Adela has been in the business for more than a year now.

Adela is asking to take a loan to buy more rice to sell to her customers. Adela believes that a loan will help her improve her stocks thus allowing her to sell more to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell to her customers

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a 33 year old sari-sari store owner from Dulag, Leyte. She has been in the business for more than 5 years now.

Agnes wants to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, bread, biscuits, candies, snack foods, and condiments. This loan will help Agnes in improving her stocks thus attracting more buyers in hers store.

Agnes hopes to expand her store in the future.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, bread, biscuits, candies, snack foods, and condiments.

loans.name: Dario

texts.en:
Hog raising is Dario’s source of income. This 38-year-old father of two has been in this business for over several years now.

Dario would like to take out a loan to buy more piglets to raise, and animal feed. A loan will help him to improve his hog raising business and thus augment his business and income.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise, and animal feed

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila is a 55-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. She is from Talibon, Bohol. She earns a living through her dressmaking business. Cirila has been in the business for more than 16 years now. This is her source of income.

Cirila is asking to take a loan to buy materials for dressmaking, like cloth, needles, thread and others. A loan will help her improve her stock of materials, thus enabling her to sew more clothes and dresses.

loans.use: to buy materials for dressmaking, like cloth, needles, thread and others

loans.name: Angelito

texts.en: A 54-year-old man from Getafe, Bohol, Angelito earns a living through rice farming. He has been in the business for more than 26 years now. Angelito is asking to take a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for his farm. A loan will help him improve the productivity of his farm, thus augmenting his harvest and yield.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for his farm

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.en:
Gabriela is a 45-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She earns a living through her tricycle transport service. She has operated this business with her husband for more than five years now. This is the source of her income.

Gabriela is asking to take a loan to buy spare parts like a wheel tire, nuts and bolts, chains and others. This loan will help her and her husband to improve their business as well as their income.

loans.use: to buy spare parts like a wheel tire, nuts and bolts, chains and others

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is a 46 year old sari-sari store owner from Leyte. She has been in the business around 4 years now.

Julieta would like to take a loan to buy more groceries like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, bread, biscuits, candies, snack foods, and condiments to sell. This loan will help Julieta in improving her stocks thus attracting more buyers in her store.

Julieta hopes to expand her store in the future.

loans.use: to buy more groceries like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, bread, biscuits, candies, snack foods, and condiments to sell.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.en:
Leonor is a 35 year old sari-sari store owner from Leyte. She has been in the business around 4 years now.

Leonor would like to take a loan to buy more groceries like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, bread, biscuits, candies, snack foods, and condiments to sell. This loan will help Leonor in improving her stocks thus attracting more buyers in her store.

Leonor hopes to expand her store in the future.

loans.use: to buy items like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, bread, biscuits, candies, snack foods, and condiments to sell.

loans.name: Edieta

texts.en:
Edieta is a 58-year-old sari-sari store owner from Leyte. She has been in the business for over 5 years now. 

Edieta wants to obtain a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, candies, snack foods and condiments. This loan will help her to improve her stock and thus attract more buyers to her store. 

Edieta hopes to expand her store in the future. She also wants to save money in order to send some of her children to school for a better education.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, bread and biscuits, candies, snack foods and condiments

loans.name: Erliza

texts.en: Erliza makes a living through her gasoline retailing business. The 38-year-old married mother of four is in business selling gasoline to the people in her place in Leyte, Philippines. Erliza needs a loan to buy more gasoline to sell. This loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more gasoline to sell
